name: custom-provider
description: A sample integration of Silex for a hosting company

SERVER_URL.description: The URL of your new Silex instance on heroku. E.g. 'https://app-name.herokuapp.com'

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: Github app ID. Create an app here with the param 'Authorization callback URL' set to the URL of your new Silex instance on heroku + '/github/oauth_callback'. E.g. 'https://app-name.herokuapp.com/github/oauth_callback'

GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Github app secret. Create an app here with the param 'Authorization callback URL' set to the URL of your new Silex instance on heroku + '/github/oauth_callback'. E.g. 'https://app-name.herokuapp.com/github/oauth_callback'
